refnamediv.refpurpose: returns true if argument is numeric zero

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: iszero returns one if its argument is an integer 0, a float 0.0 or a double 0.0 For any other arguments, of whatever type, it will return zero.
refsect1.screen: iszero(0) -> 1 (Yes it is) iszero(0.0) -> 1 (Double precision zero also is a zero) iszero(atof('0.0')) -> 1 (As well as single precision floating point) iszero(1) -> 0 (No, it's not) iszero('Cifra') -> 0 (neither is this one) iszero(NULL) -> 0 (nor this one)
